title: Ticket #281: DYNAMIC_MACH_CONSTRAINT
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

Others on the team (like Dan and Todd) have background knowledge on this change that I don't. I'll leave further comment on this part of Dan's patch set to them.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (30).
creator: gquinn
